This file compiles hydrolakes metadata using unique hydrolakes IDs

Step 1: Load packages
Step 2: Add hydrolakes data


Step 1: Load packages
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
#install.packages("foreign")
library(foreign)
```


Step 2: Add hydrolakes data
```{r}
dbf = read.dbf("../External data/HydroLAKES_points_v10_shp/HydroLAKES_points_v10.dbf")

ids = read.csv("https://pasta-s.lternet.edu/package/data/eml/edi/1029/6/fadd3eaa25b5fdd1fc4efba70e660579")%>%
  select(LakeID,hylak_id)%>%
  rename(ID = LakeID)

comb = ids%>%
  left_join(dbf, by = c("hylak_id"="Hylak_id"))

write.csv(comb,"../External data/hydrolakes_full.csv")
```
